intro: Forrestia mollis, commonly known as the Chinese evergreen, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, fragrant white flowers. The plant typically grows as an evergreen shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 10 meters in its natural habitat. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical forests. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for ornamental gardening in warm climates.
